tarifs.hero_sub: All-inclusive pricing, zero hidden fees. Every plan includes GitHub source code, production deployment, and 30 days of support.
tarifs.tier1_desc: One-page showcase site, premium design, responsive, animations, contact form.
tarifs.tier2_desc: Full site with navigation, blog, gallery, third-party integrations, payments.
tarifs.tier3_desc: Full-stack MVP, dashboard, auth, API, database, integrated AI.
tarifs.why_desc: Our costs are 2 to 5x lower than traditional agencies thanks to our 100% AI-native system. Same quality, delivered code, support included ‚Äî at a fraction of the price.

faq.hero_sub: Answers to the most common questions from our clients.
faq.q1: How does a project with DreamNova work?
faq.a1:
1. Free quote ‚Äî Configure your project via our 6-step calculator.
2. Validation ‚Äî We confirm scope, timeline, and price in < 24h.
3. 30% deposit ‚Äî Secure Stripe payment to kick off the project.
4. Development ‚Äî First draft delivered in 24-72h with a preview URL.
5. Iterations ‚Äî Unlimited revisions until you're satisfied.
6. Delivery ‚Äî GitHub source code + production deployment + 30 days support.
faq.a2:
Landing page: 24-48 hours.
Multi-page site: 3-7 days.
SaaS / MVP application: 1-3 weeks.
These timelines are possible thanks to our 100% AI-native system that accelerates production by 5x.
faq.q3: Do I receive the source code?
faq.a3: Yes, always. Every project is delivered with a complete GitHub repo. You own 100% of the code. No lock-in, no dependency.
faq.a4: Our prices depend on 3 factors: project type (site, SaaS, app), features (payments, AI, multilingual, etc.) and urgency. Use our quote calculator for an exact real-time price.
faq.q5: Why are you 2-5x cheaper than an agency?
faq.a5: DreamNova is an AI-native system. Our 6 AI agents work 24/7. No offices, no 20-person team, no pointless meetings. The result: the same quality (or better) at a fraction of the cost.
faq.q6: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a6:
Credit/debit card via Stripe (Visa, Mastercard, Amex).
Bank transfer on request.
Split payment: 30% deposit + 70% on delivery.
faq.a7:
Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
Backend: Node.js, tRPC, Vercel Serverless.
Database: Supabase, Turso, Vercel Postgres.
Payments: Stripe, PayPal.
AI: Claude Opus, Gemini, DeepSeek.
Deployment: Vercel, Netlify, GitHub Actions.
faq.a8: Absolutely. We follow security best practices: HTTPS, security headers, server-side validation, CSRF protection, API keys in environment variables. No sensitive data in code.
faq.a9: 30 days of support included (60 days for SaaS projects). This covers bugs, minor adjustments, and technical questions. Beyond that, maintenance packages are available.
faq.a10: Revisions are unlimited until you're satisfied. We work iteratively with real-time previews. If the result still doesn't fit, we discuss a fair solution.
faq.cta_sub: Contact us directly or start by configuring your free quote.

legal.s1_body: DreamNova is a web development and AI integration activity operated individually by David Amor, based in Jerusalem, Israel.
legal.s2_body: Vercel is a cloud hosting platform with globally distributed data centers (CDN). Secure HTTPS connections, 99.99% uptime SLA.
legal.s3_p1: All elements of this site are the exclusive property of DreamNova / David Amor.
legal.s3_p2: Any reproduction without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.
legal.s3_p3: Projects delivered to clients become their property upon final delivery and full payment.
legal.s4_p1: DreamNova is committed to protecting privacy in compliance with GDPR (EU 2016/679).
legal.s4_p2: Data collected: only data necessary for processing your request via the quote form.
legal.s4_p3: Purpose: responding to your request, creating a quote, executing a contract.
legal.s4_p4: Retention period: duration of business relationship + 3 years.
legal.s4_right1: Right of access to your personal data
legal.s4_right2: Right of rectification in case of inaccuracy
legal.s4_right3: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
legal.s4_contact: To exercise these rights: dreamnovaultimate@gmail.com. Response within 30 days.
legal.s5_p1: This site uses only strictly necessary technical cookies for proper functioning.
legal.s5_p2: No advertising or third-party tracking cookies are used.
legal.s5_p3: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies at any time.
legal.s6_p1: All services are preceded by a free quote. The quote becomes a contract upon electronic signature and deposit payment.
legal.s6_p2: 40% deposit at signing, 60% balance upon validated delivery.
legal.s6_p3: Timelines indicated in the quote are contractual.
legal.s6_p4: Revisions in line with the initial scope are included at no extra cost.
legal.s6_p5: Source code becomes the client's property upon receipt of full payment.
legal.s6_p6: If the client cancels after project start, the deposit is non-refundable.
legal.s7_intro: DreamNova's liability cannot be engaged in case of:
legal.s7_li1: Temporary access interruption for technical or maintenance reasons
legal.s7_li2: Viruses or malicious elements from external sources
legal.s7_li3: Inaccuracies in information provided for informational purposes
legal.s7_li4: Indirect damages resulting from use of the site
legal.s7_links: Links to third-party sites do not engage DreamNova's responsibility.
legal.s8_p1: These legal notices are governed by Israeli law.
legal.s8_p2: In case of unresolved dispute: exclusive jurisdiction of Jerusalem District Court, Israel.
legal.s9_intro: For any questions regarding these legal notices or your personal data:
